description:
The Sunlit Garden, also sometimes referred to as the Garden, is a facility owned by the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [Commission of Counter Ghoul]. It is responsible for providing "talented" children with a special education, though it is not publicly disclosed what this means. The organizations http://anidb.net/ch98950 [V] and the http://anidb.net/ch98951 [Washuu Clan] are also involved in the Garden`s management.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Hakubitei
